name: Ranger Ericsen
descriptions: Ranger Ericsen is the commander of Ranger Station Bravo in 2281.
Ericsen is the commander of Ranger Station Bravo.
Ranger Ericsen can clear Tilden to give the player character ammunition,
The NCR Rangers at the ranger stations, including Ericsen, were written by additional area designer Matt MacLean, who worked on the quest Return to Sender.

topics.response_text: {Player in NCR gear}You don't walk like any trooper I've ever seen, but I'll let it slide. What do you want?

topics.topic_text: What do you do out here?
topics.response_text: We're here to make sure the Legion doesn't try to sneak around Lake Mead and come at NCR from another direction.

topics.topic_text: Tilden mentioned you had surplus ammo. Mind if I have some?
topics.response_text: {NCR - Rascal+}You're not stationed here, but your rep with the NCR speaks for itself. It's mostly rifle rounds, but I'll throw in a few boxes of pistol ammo.
